snippet.title: Answer the Call of Yumezi, New Map  – Zwift
snippet.description:
Introducing Zwift’s newest map, Yumezi! Part of the new Makuri Islands world, it’s a place brimming with hidden life, packed with serenity and tranquility. Beneath its placid surface, however, this land rumbles with a new spirit. Of competition. Of adventure. The spirit of an ancient land is calling.

Connect with Zwift:
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/zwift
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gozwift
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/gozwift
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gozwift/

Zwift is the app that makes indoor training fun. Connecting cyclists and runners around the world, Zwift mixes the intensity of training with the immersive and engaging play of gaming. Ride or run virtual worlds with a community that motivates you at every mile. You'll get faster and stronger and have a blast doing it. 

You can become the undisputed king of the mountain, leave your competitors in your wake to become the sprint jersey holder, or simply join your friends for a leisurely run on a Sunday morning.

And you can make fun fast day or night, even if it’s raining, snowing, or just plain awful outside. Got goals? We’ve got a training plan for you that adjusts automatically depending on your schedule. Craving a workout? Explore fun and intense structured workouts to lift your cycling and running performance, or build your own workouts for the bike. 

Just download our app, connect your bike to your indoor trainer, and start your  free trial. And if you want to run, you can do that for free. Just download our app, connect your treadmill or cadence tracker, and you’ll be off and Zwifting in no time.
